info.name: TypeRacer Remix
info.description: The elegant theme for TypeRacer but make it your own. Check out the customization options "Advanced Style Settings", available on this theme. Whether dark theme or light theme.
info.additionalInfo:
Information on advanced settings: Suggestions for more customizability are accepted!

Background Color

Changes the website's background color.

Font Color

Changes the website's font color. This excludes links.

Link Color

Changes the default color of links.

Link Hover Color

Changes the color of links when hovered over.

Expanded Viewport

Changes the width of TypeRacer. Useful for people with bigger monitors.
